features.title: 500+ Exciting Levels
features.description: Challenge yourself with hundreds of unique puzzle levels that get progressively more challenging. Each level brings new challenges and exciting gameplay mechanics.

features.title: Wild Animal Collection
features.description: Discover and match beautiful safari animals with unique abilities and special powers. From majestic lions to graceful giraffes, each animal has its own personality.

features.title: Powerful Boosters
features.description: Unlock and use amazing boosters to clear difficult levels and achieve higher scores. Strategic use of boosters can turn impossible levels into exciting victories.

features.title: Stunning Safari Graphics
features.description: Immerse yourself in beautiful safari landscapes with vibrant colors and smooth animations. Every visual element is crafted to enhance your gaming experience.

features.title: Achievement System
features.description: Track your progress with a comprehensive achievement system. Unlock special rewards and showcase your puzzle-solving skills to friends and family.

features.title: Multiple Game Modes
features.description: Enjoy various game modes including Classic, Time Attack, and Puzzle Challenge. Each mode offers a unique twist on the classic match-3 gameplay.

instructions.title: Match Three or More
instructions.description: Connect three or more identical animal blocks in a row or column to make them disappear. The more blocks you match, the higher your score!

instructions.title: Create Special Combinations
instructions.description: Match four or more blocks to create powerful special blocks that can clear entire rows or columns. These special blocks are key to solving difficult levels.

instructions.title: Use Boosters Wisely
instructions.description: Collect boosters and use them strategically to overcome challenging levels and obstacles. Save powerful boosters for the most difficult situations.

instructions.title: Plan Your Moves
instructions.description: Think ahead and plan your moves carefully. Sometimes the best move isn't the most obvious one. Look for opportunities to create cascading combinations.

instructions.title: Master the Grid
instructions.description: Learn how blocks fall and plan your strategy accordingly. Understanding the grid mechanics will help you create amazing combinations and achieve higher scores.

instructions.title: Chain Reactions
instructions.description: Create chain reactions by making multiple matches in sequence. Each subsequent match in a chain gives you bonus points and special effects!

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.comment: This game is absolutely addictive! The safari theme is so much fun and the puzzles are challenging but fair. I've been playing for months and still discovering new strategies.

testimonials.name: Mike R.
testimonials.comment: Love the animal characters and the boosters make the game really exciting. Perfect for puzzle lovers! The graphics are beautiful and the gameplay is smooth.

testimonials.name: Emma L.
testimonials.comment: Great graphics and smooth gameplay. The level progression keeps me coming back for more! I love how each level feels unique and challenging.

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.comment: The safari theme is brilliant! I love matching the different animals and the boosters add a great strategic element. Highly recommend for anyone who loves puzzle games.

adventurer-text: Join thousands of puzzle enthusiasts who have discovered the magic of Safari Match! Our community of players spans across the globe, united by their love for challenging puzzles and beautiful safari adventures.

From casual gamers to puzzle masters, everyone finds something to love in Safari Match. The game's progressive difficulty system ensures that beginners can learn at their own pace while experienced players face exciting challenges.

Our players love sharing their achievements, strategies, and memorable moments. Whether you're solving your first puzzle or conquering the most difficult levels, you're part of an amazing community of safari adventurers!

animals.name: Lion
animals.description: The majestic king of the jungle with powerful matching abilities. Lion blocks are strong and can create powerful combinations when matched in groups. Their golden mane represents the highest tier of animal power, making them essential for clearing difficult obstacles and achieving high scores.
animals.special_ability: Royal Roar - Creates shockwaves that clear adjacent blocks
animals.strategy: Use lion blocks strategically to create cascading effects and clear multiple rows simultaneously

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: Mighty and wise, elephant blocks have the highest power level in the safari. They're rare but incredibly valuable for clearing difficult obstacles and creating massive chain reactions. Their massive size allows them to affect multiple grid positions at once.
animals.special_ability: Stampede - Destroys all blocks in a cross pattern
animals.strategy: Save elephant blocks for the most challenging situations and obstacles

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: Tall and graceful, giraffe blocks can reach across the grid to create unique matching opportunities and special combinations. Their long necks allow them to connect blocks that would otherwise be impossible to match, making them perfect for strategic gameplay.
animals.special_ability: Long Reach - Can match blocks across gaps and obstacles
animals.strategy: Use giraffe blocks to bridge difficult gaps and create unexpected combinations

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: Fast and agile, zebra blocks are common but essential for building momentum. They're perfect for creating quick matches and building up your score. Their striped pattern makes them easy to spot and their speed allows for rapid chain reactions.
animals.special_ability: Swift Movement - Faster matching and bonus points for speed
animals.strategy: Combine multiple zebra blocks for bonus points and rapid score building

boosters.name: Lightning Strike
boosters.description: A powerful booster that clears an entire row or column instantly. Perfect for removing stubborn obstacles and creating space for new combinations. The lightning energy can jump across gaps and affect multiple areas simultaneously, making it ideal for clearing complex board layouts.
boosters.best_use: Clearing stubborn obstacles and creating space for new combinations
boosters.strategy: Use when you need to clear a specific row or column to access blocked areas or create new matching opportunities

boosters.name: Jungle Blast
boosters.description: Creates a massive explosion that clears all blocks within a 3x3 area. Great for clearing clustered obstacles and creating opportunities for new combinations. The blast radius can be strategically positioned to maximize its effectiveness and create chain reactions.
boosters.best_use: Clearing clustered obstacles and creating space for new matches
boosters.strategy: Position the blast center on areas with the most obstacles or where it can create the best chain reactions

boosters.name: Safari Swap
boosters.description: Allows you to swap any two blocks on the grid, regardless of their position. Use strategically to create perfect combinations and unlock special blocks. This booster is perfect for situations where you're just one move away from a winning combination.
boosters.best_use: Creating perfect combinations and unlocking special blocks
boosters.strategy: Analyze the board carefully to find the most beneficial swap that will create multiple matches or special combinations

boosters.name: Wild Combo
boosters.description: Automatically finds and matches the best possible combination on the grid. Perfect for when you're stuck or need a quick boost. This intelligent booster analyzes the entire board to find the most rewarding combination, ensuring maximum points and strategic advantage.
boosters.best_use: Getting unstuck and finding optimal moves
boosters.strategy: Use when you're unsure of the best move or when you need to maximize your score in a limited number of moves
